docs.snippet: Surrounded by art and artists as she grew up, it nevertheless took Ms. Rubell years to discover that she, too, was an artist....
docs.lead_paragraph: Surrounded by art and artists as she grew up, it nevertheless took Ms. Rubell years to discover that she, too, was an artist.
docs.abstract: Artist Jennifer Rubell, daughter of two contemporary-art collectors and niece to nightclub impresario Steve Rubell, describes how her inherited talent for hosting and cooking inspired her own artwork; Rubell's latest work, fiberglass sculpture of herself nude, will be exhibited at Stephen Friedman Gallery in London as part of the Frieze Art Fair.

headline.main: Jennifer Rubell: Two Legacies, Now Home to Roost
headline.print_headline: Two Legacies, Now Home to Roost
